#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
long long mux(long long a,long long b)
{
	long long ans=1;
	while(b)
	{
		if(b%2)
		ans=(ans*a)%1000000007;
		a=(a*a)%1000000007;
		b/=2;
	}
	return ans%1000000007;
}
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int a[10]={4,25,168,1229,9592,78498,664579,5761455,50847534,455052511};
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{long long n,k,p,ans;
	cin>>n>>k;
	p=(n-k)/2;
	if((n-k)%2)
		ans=(((9*mux(10,p))%1000000007)*a[k-1])%1000000007;
	else
		ans=(((9*mux(10,p-1))%1000000007)*a[k-1])%1000000007;
	cout<<ans%1000000007<<endl;}
	return 0;
}
